title: Facebook Will Reportedly Allow Employees To Work From Home Until The End Of 2020
text: The move follows similar announcements from Amazon and Slack.

title: Facebook will allow most employees to work from home through end of 2020
text: Facebook CEO Mark Zuckerberg on Thursday will announce that most of the company's employees will be given the choice to continue to work from home through the end of 2020, a company spokeswoman told CNBC.

title: Facebook names members of oversight board that can overrule Zuckerberg
text: Facebook this week announced the members of its content oversight board which will have the power to overrule Mark Zuckerberg on what content to censor. The independent body, which has been dubbed Facebook’s “Supreme Court,” includes a former prime minister, Nobel Peace Prize laureate and a number of constitutional law experts among its 20 members,.

title: Facebook's Oversight Board Members Include Nobel Laureate, Former Denmark PM
text: Facebook Inc. (NASDAQ: FB) on Wednesday announced the first 20 members of its content oversight board, nearly 18 months after CEO Mark Zuckerbag first shared a blueprint of the plan.

title: FAANGs + 1: Higher Tech, Lower Risk
text: These stocks can withstand the shocks that are becoming more common in our interconnected world.

title: Will Facebook's new oversight board be a radical shift or a reputational shield?
text: The panel has the potential to reshape how Facebook shapes the world and possibly introduce a new era of social media governance
